item.title: Interacting with a Kubernetes Cluster
item.description: Containers containers Docker Compose Kubernetes Experimenting Minikube TODO example project Kubectl Listing objects: get pods|deployments|daemonsets|svc|nodes|TODOGETALLTYPES More information, alternate formats: get -o=wide, get -o=json Show more information: describe pod|nodes|svc|deployments|TODO Namespaces: -n NAMESPACE, --SETNAMESPACETODO Debugging Showing logs: logs Port forwarding: port-forward svc|pod NAME TODOHOSTPORT:PORT Executing a command within a container: exec, exec -it POD -- COMMAND Resource consumption: top Copying files to host: cp POD:PATH LOCALPATH Tab completion Aliases Abbreviations in Fish shell Managing Multiple configuration files Showing current cluster In Starship.

item.title: What is Kubernetes?
item.description: See my overview of how to interact with a Kubernetes cluster Containers containers Kubernetes Container Pod Groups of Pods: Deployment, Daemonset, TODO Services Node Cluster HTTP API
